attributes.action: Delete David Cameron's proposed retirement list of honours.
attributes.additional_details: The UK Honours System is becomming progressively devalued and affected by 'cronyism' where friends, colleagues and adherents of the proposers ideal are put forward for the receipt of unjustified awards!
attributes.background: The list of those that David Cameron has proposed for honours on his retirement is an abuse of the honours system as he is using it to suggest awards for political financial backers and those who have merely been carrying out the job required of them!
